hero_desc: A creative studio pushing the boundaries of immersive storytelling and game design.
about_point1: We create meaningful and immersive games.
about_point2: Our focus is on storytelling and unique gameplay.
about_point3: We collaborate with partners from all around the world.
project_point1: A narrative road trip in 3D isometric point & click on PC.
project_point2: In a post-war world, play as a young albino girl.
project_point3: Travel on foot or by truck through a devastated No Man’s Land.
project_point4: Face your inner scars and manage your resources to survive.
playtest_desc: Sign up to playtest Blind Frontiers. We would love to hear your feedback!
contact_text1: Address: 6 Rue de la République, Lyon, 69001
faq_q1: How can I join the playtest?
faq_r1: You can register through the dedicated form in the 'Join the Game' section.
faq_q2: Is Blind Bend Studio developing a game?
faq_r2: Yes! Blind Frontiers is currently in development. Follow our socials to stay updated.
faq_r3: You can reach us via the contact form at the bottom of the page.
